conditions.short_description: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.
conditions.full_description: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.

area_forecast.forecast: New snow in mountains can be unstable. Older snow is considered stable.
area_forecast.snow_condition: New snow on Saturday. New snow forecasted on Sunday and Monday. Older snow is expected to be stable but. The new snow could get unstable when it gets warmer and in the sunshine. Were it accumulates, especially high in mountains, thin unstable slabs can form. Only small avalanches are expected.
area_forecast.weather: Snjókoma til fjalla aðfaranótt sunnudags, fyrst í SV-átt og síðan SA-átt. Rigning á láglendi. Hlýnar á sunnudagsmorgun og verður frostlaust upp undir hæstu fjallatoppa. Kólnar og snjóar í A- og síðan SV-átt á mánudag.

area_forecast.forecast: New snow in mountains can be unstable. Older snow is considered stable.
area_forecast.recent_avalances: Wet slab in Naustahvilft 19th of March.
area_forecast.snow_condition: New snow on Saturday in light SW-wind. New snow forecasted on Sunday in SW-wind. Older snow is expected to be stable but. The new snow could get unstable where it accumulates but only small avalanches are expected.
area_forecast.weather: SV-átt og él aðfaranótt sunnudags, rigning eða slydda á láglendi. NA-átt á mánudag og frystir á mánudag, úrkomulítið. Lítilsháttar snjókoma í hægum vindi á þriðjudag.

area_forecast.forecast:
Snow has settled in recent days, but older wind slabs might still remain at higher elevations. Some snow is forecasted and small slabs could form, especially on S and E aspects.
Snow has settled in recent days, but older wind slabs might still remain at higher elevations.Some snow is forecasted and small slabs could form, especially on easterly aspects.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Diurnal fluctuations are affecting the snowpack these days. Some softer snow or old wind slabs can be found in gullies and depressions at higher elevations. It will snow a bit over the weekend and small slabs could form, especially on easterly aspects.
area_forecast.weather: Breytilegar áttir og snjókoma með köflum.

area_forecast.forecast: Little or no snow at low elevations and hard packed snow in the mountains with a thin cover of new snow. Softer snow is present in ravines and depressions.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Little or no snow is at low elevations and hard packed snow is in the mountains with a thin cover of new snow. Snow is considered mostly stable. Some new snow is forecasted at high elevations over the next few days and it could drift to southeasterly aspects.
area_forecast.weather: Breytilegar áttir næstu daga og úrkoma með köflum; snjókoma til fjalla en rigning eða slydda á láglendi.

weather_forecast.forecast: Variable winds and snow at times at high elevations in most parts of the country.
